attributes.action: Introduce Places of worship: security funding scheme for Scotland as well.
attributes.additional_details:
Example of incidents in last 6 months:
Arson Attack at Gurudwara (Sikh Temple) - https://www.edinburghnews.scotsman.com/our-region/edinburgh/leith/extensive-damage-to-leith-sikh-temple-in-arson-attack-1-4790819

Robbery at Edinburgh Hindu Mandir :- https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-scotland-edinburgh-east-fife-46721478

Vistors Car vandalised at other places of worship in Edinburgh and Glasgow also reported to police.
We are asking to have a consultation and provide same security scheme in Scotland irrespective of the religion be it Churches, Gurdwaras, Mosques or Hindu Temples.
attributes.background: Requesting Scottish Affairs Ministry in Westminister as well Scottish Government to deal with increasing Hate crime in Scotland and provide funding same as England and Wales - ' Places of worship: security funding scheme ' :https://www.gov.uk/guidance/places-of-worship-security-funding-scheme

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
